markdownRemark.html: You like to use Chrome, and you value the in-built development aids. However, you feel increasingly uneasy about the market dominance of Chrome as the portal to the web. You'd like to give Firefox a chance, but are uncertain if some general and dev-related features will be available on Firefox.

frontmatter.title: I'm a Chrome-using frontend dev, but want to use Firefox more

pageContext.title: I'm a Chrome-using frontend dev, but want to use Firefox more
